data.name: Hell of Men : Blood Brothers Demo
data.detailed_description:
About this game:

Hell of Men Blood Brothers is a real-time strategy game. It is a skirmish game that offers innovative mechanics that reward thoughtful and strategic players. With the cover system for infantry, class combinations, the danger of vehicles by their firepower and resistance, HoM is close to simulation, you will have to learn to use all these aspects. Each environment is designed to allow you to develop realistic strategic movements and thus dominate your opponent.

Faction :
Poland and Russia.
13 types of buildings (HQ, Barrack, Infirmary, Com-Center, Laboratory, Container, Tent, Armory, Radar, Fixe Machinegun, Sandbox, X Defense, Barricade).
6 types of vehicles (Buggy, Jeep, Truck, Armoured Support, Light Tank, Tank).
13 types of units (Technicien, Sapper, Rifleman, Machinegunner, Rocket Launcher, Grenade Launcher, Tank Crew, Spec Ops Operator, Sniper, Medic, UAV, battle drone, collect drone).

Demo :
Tutoriel + one skirmish mission where you play Poland army against Russian army.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA - GTX 960M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
